sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-row>
    <v-col
        cols="12"
        xs="12"
        sm="12"
        md="12"
        lg="6"
        xl="6"
    >
      <v-list
          subheader
      >
        <v-subheader class="mt-4">
          <v-icon class="mr-4">mdi-notebook-outline</v-icon>
          INFORMACIÓN PRINCIPAL
        </v-subheader>
      </v-list>
      <v-divider></v-divider>
      <v-list>
        <v-list-item
            v-for="input in profile"
            :key=input.text
        >
            <v-text-field
                v-if="input.type === 'text'"
                :prepend-icon=input.icon
                :label=input.label
                :model=input.value
            ></v-text-field>
            <v-select
                v-if="input.type === 'select'"
                :prepend-icon=input.icon
                :label=input.label
                :model=input.value
                :items=input.items
            ></v-select>

        </v-list-item>
      </v-list>
    </v-col>
    <v-col>
    </v-col>
  </v-row>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "ActorEditProfile",
  data: () => ({
    profile: {
      name: {
        label: "Nombre",
        icon: "mdi-form-textbox",
        type: "text",
        value: null
      },
      age: {
        label: "Edad",
        icon: "mdi-cake-variant-outline",
        type: "text",
        value: null
      },
      hair: {
        label: "Cabello",
        icon: "mdi-hair-dryer-outline",
        type: "text",
        value: null
      },
      eyes: {
        label: "Ojos",
        icon: "mdi-eye-outline",
        type: "text",
        value: null
      },
      height: {
        label: "Sexo (Se utilizará para filtrar en página principal)",
        icon: "mdi-human",
        type: "select",
        items: ['Hombre','Mujer','Otros','Sin indicar'],
        value: null
      }
    }
  })
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
